import React from 'react' import background from "../assets/background.JPEG" import Flexbox from 'flexbox-react'; const Motivations = () => { const style = { //Now working backgroundImage: `url(${background})`, height: "100vh", backgroundSize: "cover", } return (

Project Motivations

Industry OutlookCurrent EffortsGoals

According to the International Energy Agency, global oil demand could
decrease by more than 50% over the next 25 years due to global efforts
in achieving NZE. As such, SCB faces the challenge of redistributing
investments towards more sustainable companies.
